# Download Finance Reports

**Web Service Endpoint**

Download finance reports filtered by your specified criteria.

## Discussion

For more information see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/getting-paid/download-financial-reports].

## Downloading Reports

- **Download Sales and Trends Reports**: Download sales and trends reports filtered by your specified criteria.
